testcase.name: should be zero in size by default
should grow once in size when watered just once
should grow twice in size when watered twice
should have the specified health at creation time
should be dead when health set to zero manually

testsuite.name: plants versus zombies!.creating zombies.killing zombies with plants, wow!

testcase.name: should kill a zombie with health 1 after watering the plant once

testcase.name: should damage the zombie by the size of the plant
